name: hicli

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(co(c0, csp, c1), cc), wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba))

body.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, csp, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, chba)
-| wcel(c1, chba)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(co(c0, csp, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, csp, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, chba)
-| wcel(c1, chba)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(co(c0, csp, c1), cc))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, chba), wcel(c1, chba)), wcel(co(c0, csp, c1), cc))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(co(c0, csp, c1), cc)
-| wcel(c0, chba)
-| wcel(c1, chba)

comment: Closure inference for inner product. (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
